sentence.Network_en: French managers are Napoleonic and their management style is imperial.
sentence.Network_cn: 法国的经理人是拿破仑似的人物,管理风格傲慢自大.

sentence.Network_en: The British attacked twice during the Napoleonic wars in the early 1800 s.
sentence.Network_cn: 在19世纪初,拿破仑战争期间,又遭到了英国人的两次攻击.

sentence.Network_en: Congress of Vienna: ( 1814 - 15 ) Assembly that reorganized Europe after the Napoleonic Wars.
sentence.Network_cn: 维也纳会议: ( 1814～1815 ) 在拿破仑战争之后召开的改组欧洲的会议.
